solution.linktext: Billing FAQs for Dynamics 365 (online) Customer Engagement

supportoption.title: Chat with Microsoft Support
supportoption.description: Chat online with a live Microsoft Support agent.
supportoption.linkurl: http://www.microsoftpartnersupport.com/create-incident?mpnid={LOCID}&email=oemincentives@microsoft.com&supporttopicid_l1=Billing and Payments&supporttopicid_l2=Billing Information&supporttopicid_l3=Request modification to Dynamics billing and payment terms&locale=nl-be&language=EN" target="_blank" data-tracking-supportoption="MBS-Ops-Chat

supportoption.title: Submit an incident
supportoption.description: Connect with experts to get answers to your questions.
supportoption.linkurl: http://www.microsoftpartnersupport.com/create-incident?mpnid={LOCID}&email=oemincentives@microsoft.com&supporttopicid_l1=Billing and Payments&supporttopicid_l2=Billing Information&supporttopicid_l3=Request modification to Dynamics billing and payment terms&locale=fr-be&language=FR" target="_blank" data-tracking-supportoption="MBS-Ops-WebSubmission

supportoption.title: Credit and Collections Escalation Support
supportoption.description: Contact the appropriate Credit and Collections team for your Payment, Collection and Credit Limit queries
